nal.desc: To exchange for cash, Tinkoff QR, or other coins that are not listed on the website, contact us via the «Telegram» messenger to place a request.

Укажите номер телефона и банк получателя: Indicate the recipient's phone number and bank
Внимательно проверяйте сумму: Carefully check the amount you send to our wallet; if it subsequently turns out to be less than specified, the application will be considered unpaid.
В случае, если транзакция: If a transaction is identified as risky, we may suspend the exchange operation and ask you to complete an identification procedure.
правилами обмена и политики AML: the exchange protocol and AML policy.
Правила stuartexchange: stuart.exchange rules and AML and CTF policies
На сайте stuartexchange: The stuart.exchange website is subject to AML and CTF rules
Противодействие отмыванию денег (AML): Anti-Money Laundering (AML) is a set of measures and procedures aimed at identifying and/or preventing the use of the website, StuartExchange services and/or Services provided by StuartExchange for the purpose of money laundering. The maximum allowable “risk score” of a transaction is 50%
Противодействие финансированию: Counter-Terrorism Financing (CTF) is a set of measures and procedures aimed at identifying and/or preventing the use of the Site, StuartExchange Services and/or Services provided by StuartExchange for the purpose of terrorist financing.
В случае несоблюдения правил: In case of non-compliance with AML and CTF rules. We have the right to block a transaction and ask you to verify these assets. StuartExchange Service undertakes not to dispose of these funds.
Для возврата средств необходимо: To return funds, you must provide a screenshot (video) of the transfer from the wallet, as well as the transaction hash and cryptocurrency address from the email specified in the exchange application.
Спасибо за ваш обмен, возвращайтесь к на: Thank you for your exchange, come back to us again!
Ваша заявка успешно выполнена!: Your request has been successfully completed!
Данная операция производится оператором: Payment is made manually by the operator and takes from 5 to 60 minutes
Связь: The exchange is conducted in semi-automatic mode, and the payment is made manually, which may take from 5 to 60 minutes.
Мы получили платеж, находимся в процессе: We have received payment and are in the process of payment
В случае возникновении каких-либо вопрос: If you have any questions or if your coins have not reached us, write to the online chat on the website or in our telegram.
Ваш E-mail успешно подтвержден!: Your email has been successfully confirmed!
На ваш E-mail была выслана ссылка, для в: A link has been sent to your email to verify your profile, follow it to activate your account

Index.sendBitcoinDesc1: Send your bitcoin to the address below
Index.sendBitcoinDesc2: Cleaned funds will arrive in 3-6 hours after the first network confirmation
Index.reviewText1: The best exchanger of all that I know. I advise everyone only here. Very fast and a good course!
Index.reviewText2: Everything is fine, I exchanged BTC for QR, after the first confirmation on the network I immediately received a QR code in a telegram! Thank you
Index.reviewText3: I exchanged usdt for cash in Moscow, everything is clear, I didn't show any documents, I came, took the cash and left, thanks for the well-coordinated and, most importantly, anonymous opportunity to get cash! Good luck and prosperity to you
Index.reviewText4: Received cash by courier in Warsaw! Very competent guys, I will contact you again!
Index.anonymityDesc: We do not ask for or store our customers' data. By choosing us, you guarantee your privacy.
Index.stableRateDesc: Our exchanger works using the CoinGecko API - the exchange rate is fixed at the time of the transaction, which gives transparency of the exchange and without imposing additional commissions.
Index.instantExchangeDesc: Our operators work 24/7! We guarantee the speed of exchange transactions and fiat payments!
Index.howToExchangeCashTitle: How to make an exchange for
Index.howToExchangeCashDesc: To make an exchange for cash, contact us via the Telegram messenger to make an application
Index.cleanBitcoinsTitle: With us, you can clean your bitcoins in a couple of clicks
Index.contactForExchange: We will contact you within 3 minutes to complete the exchange. The exact exchange rate will be sent after contacting the operator
Index.thankYouMessage: Thank you for your application! We will contact you within 3 minutes on the “Telegram” messenger to complete the exchange
